scripts.update-ckeditor: cd external_modules/ckeditor4/ && git pull origin major && cd ./dev/builder/ && build.sh && cd ../../../../ && git add external_modules/ckeditor4
scripts.copy-static: rm -r dist && cp -r html dist && cp -r external_modules/ckeditor4/dev/builder/release/ckeditor/ dist/ && cp -r external_modules/fontawesome dist/ && cp -r assets dist/ && cp ./node_modules/react/umd/react.production.min.js ./dist/settings/ && cp ./node_modules/react-dom/umd/react-dom.production.min.js ./dist/settings
scripts.compile-main: npm run lint && npx webpack --config webpack.renderer.production.js && tsc -p tsconfig.main.production.json
scripts.compile-main-debug: npm run lint && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx webpack --config webpack.renderer.development.js && tsc -p tsconfig.main.development.json
scripts./* notice for compile-all */: /* tsc in compile-main must be run finally because the .ts files under modules_common are temporally overwritten by compile-iframe command and webpacks
scripts.compile-all: npm run compile-iframe && npm run compile-settings && npm run compile-main
scripts.compile-all-clean: npm run copy-static && npm run compile-all
scripts./* debug-main */: /* Please launch [Main (rxdesktop)] from VSCode debugger after compile-main-debug */
scripts./* debug-renderer */: /* Please launch [Renderer (rxdesktop)] from VSCode debugger after compile-main-debug and [Main (rxdesktop)] */
